name: Fun Drift Racing For Kids
description:
There are many drift racing games and this is the first one made for kids!

Fun Drift Racing For Kids is a simple and fun game to play for little kids, it is easy enough for a 2 year old and can be fun to play for 10 year old! Just try it yourself and give it to your children, they will love it!

Pick your drift car and slide through the track to break all the bonus plates! Unlock all the challenges and become the champion! Good luck! If you are looking for kids games, you came to the right place - our kids racing games series will be something your loved one will play every day.

Sounds:
cottonmouth - timeshift
DOCTOR VOX - Frontier
SDDx - Inspiration
freesfx.co.uk
